column2: if you choose to include personal information
if you choose to include personal information
You can always choose not to provide information, even though it may be needed to use our services.
If you do not want to receive our newsletter or marketing communications from us, you can click the "unsubscribe" link at the bottom of the email you receive.

If you do not want to receive emails from us about specific geocaches or Trackables, you can change your preferences by logging into your account and removing these geocaches and/or Trackables from your Watchlist or bookmarks.

If you have granted us access to your Facebook or Twitter account by linking, you can disconnect the link by logging into your account, accessing your profile and clicking the Facebook or Twitter icon to disconnect.
You may use the tools in your browser to decline, disable, or delete any cookies.
